description: The 22-year-old man, who killed one person and injured two others in Villejuif, had psychiatric issues.
title: Paris Villejuif stabbings: Attacker 'had psychiatric condition'
title_page: Paris Villejuif stabbings: Attacker 'had psychiatric condition' - BBC News
maintext: "I extend my support to the victims of the attack, their families and the police," he said. "We resolutely pursue the fight against indiscriminate violence and our fight for the security of all French people."
